title: Qualcomm refutes claims of Snapdragon 810 delays | Trusted Reviews
description: ![Qualcomm]()### Alexa’s new whisper mode rolls out in US today – here’s how to enable it](https://www.trustedreviews.com/news/how-to-enable-alexa-whisper-mode-echo-3607478 "Alexa’s new whisper mode rolls out in US today – here’s how toenable it")  * Although Qualcomm has failed to comment on the validity of these claims, thechipset maker has promised that the processor will not be delayed.Snapdragon 810 chipset aside, if you want to know what else you can expectfrom the S6, check out our video guide below.**Via:**[TechRadar](http://www.techradar.com/news/phone-and-communications/mobile-phones/galaxy-s6-and-lg-g4-facing-delays-thanks-to-snapdragon-810-defects--1275829)
